room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by ROOM 5280 in Seattle
review: "The Experiment" was first escape room and it was challenging, but so much fun! There were 6 of us and we were able to finish with 30 seconds to spare (we had a rough start). Highly recommend, you won't be disappointed!

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by ROOM 5280 in Seattle
review: We played the experiment the other day! Great fun room with an awesome backstory! It was a fun room, but about 1-2 things were a little confusing as some of the clues that went together, you had to guess they went together, but overall a great experience! Excited to try the other two rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by ROOM 5280 in Seattle
review: We played the experiment with two people and it was a blast. Though the theming may not be on par with Disneyland, the puzzles were challenging and rewarding to solve. Not the typical escape room puzzles. Peter was an excellent game master and explained the puzzles a little after!
